statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT name, age, occupation FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, name, location FROM customer_profiles WHERE occupation='Engineer';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE location='New York';
SELECT id, name, interests FROM customer_profiles WHERE interests LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, gender FROM customer_profiles WHERE occupation = 'Engineer' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, location, interests FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 40 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location LIKE '%York%'
SELECT id, name, occupation FROM customer_profiles WHERE interests LIKE '%programming%' ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, gender FROM customer_profiles WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM personas WHERE behavior = 'active';
SELECT name, age FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM personas WHERE interests LIKE '%reading%';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT cp.name, p.description FROM customer_profiles cp INNER JOIN personas p ON cp.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE cp.location = 'New York';
SELECT cp.age, COUNT(p.persona_id) AS num_personas FROM customer_profiles cp LEFT JOIN personas p ON cp.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY cp.age HAVING num_personas > 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location = 'Los Angeles' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, income, education FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, occupation, marital_status FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT c.name, d.education, p.product_name FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE d.income > 60000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE address='123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age FROM age_groups JOIN customers ON age_groups.customer_id=customers.customer_id WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customers.customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, COUNT(interest_id) AS num_interests FROM customers LEFT JOIN interests ON customers.customer_id = interests.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING COUNT(interest_id) > 1;
SELECT customers.customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, age FROM customers JOIN age_groups ON customers.customer_id = age_groups.customer_id WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE product_name = 'Laptop'
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, occupation FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, persona_name FROM customers JOIN personas ON customers.customer_id = personas.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT p.purchase_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name, p.amount FROM purchases p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT d.customer_id, d.age, d.gender, i.interest FROM demographics d LEFT JOIN interests i ON d.customer_id = i.customer_id;
